bibl.title: Letter from Robert S. Minturn to Howard A. Kelly, June 30, 1907

div1.p: Minturn sends a contribution for Kissinger.

div1.head: Letter from Robert S. Minturn to Howard A. Kelly, June 30, 1907
div1.opener:
Dr L please
ans.
Ans. July 4, C L.
Point à Pic
P.2. Canada.
June 30. 1907.
Dear Sir,
div1.p:
I enclose a cheque
to your order for $50. to
be used for John R. Kissinger,
whose case is described in
this week's “Outlook”.

I should be glad to know
further details of his situation.
Certainly he should receive a
pension, even if his disease
did not have its origin
in his act of self-sacrifice.
div1.closer:
Sincerely yours Robert Shaw Minturn Howard A. Kelly Esq.
1418 Eutaw Place
Baltimore
